info.title: Polymarket Proxy API
info.description: A fully typed proxy server for Polymarket CLOB and Gamma APIs. Provides type-safe endpoints with comprehensive validation and automatic OpenAPI schema generation.

tags.name: Gamma API
tags.description: Market and event data from gamma-api.polymarket.com

tags.name: CLOB API
tags.description: Trading and price history from CLOB client

parameters.description: Polymarket private key for CLOB authentication (required in production, optional in development)
parameters.name: x-polymarket-key

parameters.description: Polymarket funder address for CLOB operations (required in production, optional in development)
parameters.name: x-polymarket-funder

get.description: Retrieve price history for a specific token via market query parameter. Supports interval-based queries (1m, 1h, 6h, 1d, 1w, max) or time range queries. Time ranges can be specified using Unix timestamps (startTs, endTs in seconds) or human-readable dates (startDate, endDate like '2025-08-13' or '2025-08-13T00:00:00.000Z'). Optional fidelity parameter controls data resolution in minutes. Headers x-polymarket-key and x-polymarket-funder are required in production, optional in development (falls back to environment variables).

parameters.description: Polymarket private key for CLOB authentication (required in production, optional in development)
parameters.name: x-polymarket-key

parameters.description: Polymarket funder address for CLOB operations (required in production, optional in development)
parameters.name: x-polymarket-funder

get.description: Check the health status of CLOB client connection. Headers x-polymarket-key and x-polymarket-funder are required in production, optional in development (falls back to environment variables). Response includes cache status.
Get cache statistics for SDK instances and CLOB clients. Shows current cache size and limits.

get.description: Retrieve the current order book for a specific token ID. Returns bids, asks, and market metadata including minimum order size and tick size. Headers x-polymarket-key and x-polymarket-funder are required in production, optional in development (falls back to environment variables).

parameters.name: x-polymarket-key

parameters.description: Polymarket funder address for CLOB operations (required in production, optional in development)
parameters.name: x-polymarket-funder

post.description: Retrieve order books for multiple token IDs. Each item should include token_id and optionally side (BUY/SELL). Headers x-polymarket-key and x-polymarket-funder are required in production, optional in development (falls back to environment variables).
